description.narrative: To strengthen INIAF and the Recipient's National Agricultural and Forestry Innovation System (“SNIAF”) in order to contribute to productivity growth, food security, sustainable rural development and the income-earning potential of Recipient's families dependent on agriculture and forestry.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV; 4.01 of the FA. | Description :Maintenance of INIAFs Legal Framework and the Normas Basicas delSistema de Administracin de Bienes y Servicios (Procurement Regulations) throughout the implementation of the Project | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Article IV; 4.02 of the FA. | Description :Co-financing Deadline on June 1, 2012 | Due Date :01-Jun-2012
Finance Agreement :Article V; 5.01 (b); Schedule 2, Section I.C | Description :Operational Manual approved/adopted | Due Date:29-Jun-2011
Finance Agreement :Article V; 5.01(a) & 5.02; Section I.B of Schedule 2 | Description :Subsidiary Agreement between INIAF and theRecipient signed and Legal Opinion issued | Due Date :20-Jan-2012
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section D.2 | Description :Procurement audits to be carried out by independent auditors | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section G.1 & 2 | Description :INIAF shall comply with the provision of the ESMF and PAMP, andensure that no Category A activities are carried out under the Project, nor does the Project give rise to Displaced Persons or are| Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section G.3 | Description :Consultants designing policy frameworks shall abide by the Associationssafeguard policies. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A.3 | Description :Establishment of Evaluation Committee for the Research Fund | Due Date:01-Nov-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.E | Description :INIAF to enter into Sub-Financing Agreements for the financing ofResearch Subprojects Sub& Strategic Alliance Subprojects under terms and conditions set forth in the Operational Manual. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.F | Description :INIAF to enter into Pilot Subproject Agreement with two Departments ofthe Recipient for the financing of Pilot Subprojects, under terms and conditions set forth in the Operational Manual | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I.A.1(b) & (c) | Description :Maintenance of a Technical Coordination Team and Board ofDirectors throughout the Project | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I.A.1(d) | Description :Competitive selection of staff for Project Management | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I.A.2 | Description :Establishment of Research Fund Management Unit | Frequency :Yearly
